newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian bond spread over bunds narrows to 100 bps.
newsitem.headline: Italian bond spread over bunds narrows to 100 bps.

text.p: The spread between Italian 10-year BTP bonds and the benchmark bund narrowed to a record 100 basis points on Monday afternoon before widening again to 101 bps.
The previous all time-low in the spread was reached on Friday when it touched 101 basis points.
Italian September BTP futures on LIFFE rose to a record high of 136.26 on Monday before easing back slightly. Milan newsroom +392-66102321
